"Speeder": "Hey, what's good! Speeder's the name, and runnin's my game."
"Hear me out, will ya? Lately I've noticed that ARKS have been straight lackin' in the running department, see?"
"So I got these machines that'll hammer the essence of runnin' into ya!"
"You pickin' up what I'm puttin' down? If not, it's all good. It is what it is."
"What I'm tryna say is, I got these machines that'll put yer runnin' skills to the test."
"Oh... Aight. Bummer, I was hopin' I'd get to check out yer technique."
"What's good! How ya doin'? Stayin' active, yeah?"
"Yo! Whassup! Say, you ever wanted to be as fast as the wind?"
"'Course ya do! Who doesn't?! Now what if I told you it was possible?!"
"Y'know those machines I told you about? You can also use 'em to test your Floating Board chops."
"C'mon, y'know I'm gonna ask you to give it a spin, don'tcha?"
"Oh... Aight. Bummer, I was hopin' I'd get to watch you go all like, \"fwoosh\"... y'know..."
